# Sana Abbott

 

[Town Council](https://www.townofmonument.org/Directory.aspx?DID=14)  
Title: Councilmember  
[sabbott@tomgov.org](mailto:sabbott@tomgov.org)

Sana Abbott has lived in Monument since 2005 after relocating from southern California. She moved out to start a family and has been here since. Prior to California, she lived in Arizona and attended Arizona State University, graduating with her B.S in 2000. She is a mother of two teens that have been part of Lewis Palmer School District 38 since 2010.

Sana currently works at L3Harris as an engineering manager. Prior to that she worked at manager at Honeywell and a systems administrator at Boeing. Sana has had a career in the defense industry since 2005.

Sana served on her neighborhood HOA for over 10 years, resigning to become a town councilmember. She was also part of the Home Rule Charter Commission in 2022.
